Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Temba Bavuma won the toss and elected to field first, stating they were unsure about the wicket but confident in their chasing strength.
India captain Rishabh Pant mentioned the team's focus on increasing their run rate in the middle overs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Rajkot.
South Africa had several forced changes due to injuries, including Rabada, Parnell, and Reeza Hendricks missing out.
